item.description:
Our Sangha has a booth at several festivals each year for outreach. This festval is an all day event. We are looking for volunteers to help with the event. If you are interested please sign up for the event and or talk to Ryuoh Shonin. This event is a great way to meet people, spread the Dharma and help build our Sangha here in New England.

We will meet at the Temple and carpool to the event.


Portland Pride takes place at Deering Oaks Park.

12:45pm - Parade begins

01:00pm - 5:00pm - Festival
More Information about pride, visit their website at www.southernmainepride.org/
item.name: Portland Maine Pride Festival
